bots

Class RandBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • bots.Bot
      • bots.RandBot

  • public class RandBot
extends Bot
    The RandBot is a very basic Bot that moves and shoots randomly. Sometimes it overheats. It trash talks when it kills someone.

      • Fields inherited from class bots.Bot

      • getMove

        public int getMove(BotInfo me,
                   boolean shotOK,
                   BotInfo[] liveBots,
                   BotInfo[] deadBots,
                   Bullet[] bullets)
        Generate a random direction, then stick with it for a random count between 30 and 90 moves. Randomly take a shot when done each move.
        Specified by:
        getMove in class Bot
        Parameters:
        me - A BotInfo object with all publicly available info about this Bot
        shotOK - True iff a FIRE move is currently allowed
        liveBots - An array of BotInfo objects for the other Bots currently in play
        deadBots - An array of BotInfo objects for the dead Bots littering the arena
        bullets - An array of all Bullet objects currently in play
        Returns:
        A legal move (use the constants defined in BattleBotArena)
